1113.content:
You, a 14 year old girl named Shelby, are in a world of hurt.
You see, a while ago you and your friends got bored.
Very bored.
So of course, you did what any self-respecting girl of your age would do- throw a party.
Unfortunetely, the party got a little out of hand.
Soon, flames erupted- just a little one- in the bathroom.
But that's all it took- soon, your whole house went up in flames.
And that's how you became a charizard.
The end.

What?
You want to hear what happened?
Well, I suppose I could tell you. Let me warn you though- it's not a pretty story.
Not a pretty story at all.
So I suppose I should start at the night of the incident.

You looked up from the misty lawn of your house.
Something seemed very mysterious tonight.
Shaking your head, you wander back to your house. Why were you out there, when the party was just about to start?
You had so much work to do- there were snacks to set up, music to be hooked up- you had no time to just be loitering around outside!
Quickly, you head over to your table and realize something- you forget buy chips!
Now you would have to set out fruit or something! Crap!

You chek your watch, and sigh.
There MIGHT be enough time to go to the nearest store and pick some up.............. maybe?
I dunno................... should you take the risk?
1113.title: Charizard

choices: Go look at the womans table.
There's not enough time! Just hurry and get the chips!
11131.content:
Well, no self-respecting party could be without chips! Surely you could make it in time... Right? It's not like the store was too far away, just down the street.
Not wasting any more time thinking about it, you grabbed your coat, and ran out the door.
Your feet pounding on the pavement, the houses flying by. You struggled to get your coat on while you ran.
Sooner than you expected, you reached the store. You were a little surprised to see the old woman standing in front of the store, with a little table of jewelry in front of her.
Glancing at your watch again, you see that there's still time. Not much, but probably enough.
It couldn't take more than a few minutes...
11131.title: Head over to the store, quickly!

Treating the red feathers as a skin condition, you walk in and have as much fun as anyone would have in a museum. She pokes the frayed wire a bit before letting it swing and touch the other end, making a spark, revving the engine and closing the doors. You only noticed the doors shut before a light filled the pods. The surrounding crowd watched as both pods open only to see a...

121.title: Pikachu family

1211.content:
Even, though you're a 14 year old boy, you still like pokemon.
And you're pretty sure you'll keep liking pokemon, no matter how long you live.
Ever since that first day that friend told about pokemon aso many years ago, your excitement for the strange little creatures was still going strong.
So that's why when you came home that afternoon, you found yourself popping in your old 'Pokemon: Yellow Version' into your dusty old gameboy, just for a rush of noglastica.
Little did you know that your life was about to change forever on this day because of a single pokemon game and a strange twist a fate. A twist of fate that would change your life permanently.

That afternoon when you arrived home from school, it was just like any other day: get up, go to school, come back, and sleep.
But however, you did always manage squeeze a little free-time each day into your favorite thing- pokemon.
Truth was, you weren't even sure WHY you liked pokemon. It was just something about those strange little animals that always drew you towards them.
They always seemed to be filled with happiness and excitement, unlike your boring life. They went on adventures and performed awesome moves and abilities while you sat at school and took notes on random crap you couldn't care less about. And you always had a fascination with animals.
But no other pokemon drew your attention so much as the the most famous one of all, Pikachu.
For crying out loud, he was the star of the whole franchise!
He was a cute little mouse with electric powers, and everybody loved him.
Which, in a way, is why you envied him.

To tell the truth, you always thought it would be kinda cool to BE a pokemon.
Just imagine, a life full of adventure, excitement, and awesome abilities! It would be so cool! Most of all, you deeply wished you could be that cute little electric mouse, Pikachu.
But a long time ago, gave up those dreams, for you knew they were absolutely rediculous.
Becoming a pokemon? Hah! Why would you even consider the possibility! But deep down inside, you still thought it would be kinda cool.

When you came home after school that afternoon, as I've explained before, you popped in your old 'Pokemon: Yellow Version' into your nearly broken old gameboy color.
You used to play the game for hours on end, and never got tired of playing the game over and over again, trying to max out your pokemons' potential.
Sure blue and red version were pretty much exactly the same as yellow, but there was one crucial thing that was missing form the other two: that cute little pixelated pikachu that followed you everywhere.
You used to be in love with that pikachu, and would check its mood about every two minutes.
For crying out loud, you probably maxed out its stats at least a million times!
Yep, those were the good times.

You you turn on your gameboy, and you already feel noglastica hitting on the head when a nidorina and a gengar duke it out in a cheap battle, followed by the title screen.
You also see the familiar mug of pikachu on the front the screen as a small message at the bottom insists that you hit the start button.
So of course, you hit the start button.
When you first start the game, you start a new file and see familiar old Proffessor Oak as he explains about the world of pokemon, followed by him having a hard time remembering your name.
When he asks you what your name is though, something different happens.
The name choices get messed up.
Instead of there being the normal "Ash" and "Yellow" name choices, it gives you the names "Lopn", "Mysi", and "Haun".

Your eyebrow lifts slightly in confusuion, but you decide to choose a name anyway.
Which one do you choose?
1211.title: Pikachu

12111.content:
You decide to choose 'Lopn'.
You don't know why you chose that name, you just did. Maybe becuase you liked how it sounded.
Either way, it didnt matter now- your pokemon adventure was about to start!

For the rest of beggining, you did exactly what the game wanted you to do- you know, pick your rivals name and and talk to your mom, etc.
In your last file you had named your rival "Mr. Poophead", but that was back when you were eight. Now you were more mature.
You named your rival "Captain Fail".
When the game began, you ran out into the fields, just like you weren't supposed to.
But of course, that was the only way to proceed in the game.

As you expected, the professor came rushing up and tried to stop you, but it was too late- a wild pokemon battle ensued.
The thing that happened next is probably one of the most mysterious things that has happened in man-kind.
You see, the screen spun from white to black, like it always does when a pokemon battle happens. But then it spun back from black to black to white again.
At first you don't notice this, but then it starts repeating itself over and over again, spinning back and forth from black and white.
You get a little angry right then. Had your game frozen up? Was it broken? If it was, you would have to try to find a whole other game. And as far as you knew, no one was gonna sell it for a cheap price.

You start to throw a fit, but then the spinning starts to catch your eye. Was it just you, or was it getting brighter?
Indeed, it was getting brighter- and it kept shinging brighter and brighter by the second.
First you notice that the screen starts to light up as if it were a DS or something.
Next, it starts to become as bright as a flashlight. But that doesn't stop it's increase in brightness. Soon it becomes as bright as a street light, and then a car light!
The spinning keeps on getting faster, and the screen keeps on getting brighter and brighter.
At this point, you start getting scared. Is your game gonna blow up or something? What the heck is going on!?

Soon the game becomes brighter than you could possibly imagine. Infact, you start having a hard time seeing the room!
Everything seems to be getting taken over by this swirling combination of brightness.
You try to run away, but it's no use- by the time you turn around, the door has faded into the light.
Soon the whole room becomes engulfed in a mad swirl of black and white, and all you can do is scream. But your scream is cut short by the blinding light, which soon even takes over the sound in the room itself. You black out.

What seems like hours later, you wake up.
You grab your head and moan, but something doesn't feel right- everything on your body feels out of place or bent weird. Maybe you got a bump on your head?
You slowly crack your eyes open to see if you can find the problem, but ti's no use- everything is still covered in a brilliant white light.
You have to admit though, the light actaully seems kind of............... well, peacefull now.
Still, it prevents you form seeing, so you try to get up and walk. But when you do you trip over your feet and clumsily fall over!
You try to say 'ow', but your voice seems to be sore form that strange experience, preventing you form talking.
Just as your about to give up, the light starts to fade.

Giddily, you stand up again.
Finally, now you can see again! A certain energy comes over you, and you suddenly feel ready for anything.
It's like some sort of lightining bolt has hit you and filled you up with energy!
Despite all of the energy though, you wait patiently for the light to fade away. And that's when you notice something- you're not in your room anymore.

As the light fades, you see everything around you.
You're outside, standing in a bunch tall grass, but there's something that's very wrong.
Either you got smaller, or everthing else got bigger!
You start to look around in panic, and try to absorb in everything. Normally at this point you would have made some wise crack such as "I don't think we're in Kansas anymore", but due to your fear, confusuion, and lack of ability to speak, you don't.
You notice a strange twitching sensation just above your butt, and just as you're about to turn around to see what it is, you hear a strange old man in the distance yell "Go pokeball!"

You focus on where the voice came from, only to find familiar white and red ball come flying at you at high speeds.
Quick, what do you do!?
12111.title: Strange Ocurrance

121112.content:
Qucikly, you dodge the ball, barely avoiding it as it slips past you.
You land on all fours in the grass, and become confused.
Why had had old man thrown that pokeball at you? Why did you feel so weird? And most of all.............. why were you on all fours?!
Qucikly, your mind forces you to forget these thoughts, and disregard them as normal. Your mind only wanted to focus on one thing now............. attacking the old man that had attacked you!
Someone had just thrown a pokeball at you!
And you just dodged it by jumping several feet through the air! Were you gonna sit there and take that?! No way!
A foreign instinct bubbles up inside you, and on all fours, you rush at the old man. 'Destroy the evil man!' your mind cries, 'Or else he will destroy you!'

You rush through the tall grass, watching it brush by you in a blur.
Your breathing becomes fast, and as you sprint towards the man on all fours, you feel a strange energy take over your whole body.
A very, very dangerous energy.
Approaching the man, you get a better look at his appearance. You don't know why, but he seems very familiar...........
No time to worry about that now though. You are just about to hit the man,, and destroy his threatening prescence!
You would've normally laughed at him when you saw him frantically searching for another pokeball when you were a few yards away from him, but you didn't.
You didn't have time to laugh now- your whole body was focused on pure instinct.

As you approached the man, that strange, powerful energy in your body increased.
And just as you jumped at the man, ready to slam him into the ground, the energy EXPLODED out of your body, and into................. electricity?!?!?!
Your whole body becomes paralyzed with shock (no pun intended), your instincts lose control, and you drop straight out of the air.
Electricity!? How in the world did electricity start form out of your body?!
Were you gonna die now? Was the energy the source of the electricity? What the heck was going on?!?!

You hit the ground with a soft THUD, and lay there, lost in your own thoughts for a few seconds.
And that was all of the time the man needed to retaliate.
Quickly, he pulled out another pokeball and chucked it at your head, causing a bruise form there.
The pokeball bounced straight up into the air, and popped open.
Both you and the man stare nervously at the pokeball, and suddenly you see a sight that was more terrifying than the spinning in your room- with a single PSEW! sound, a translucent red lazer flies towards you, and engulfs your whole body.

You freak out and try to get up, but it's too late- in a split second, you feel your whole body dissolve into the lazer and be sucked into the pokeball.
You try to scream, but you can't, for obvious reasons.
Soon, you're greeted by pitch black darkness.
You try to struggle, and almost break free of the pokeball's iron grip, but you eventually fail.
You hear the sickening click of the pokeball's hatch next to you, and realize that you've been captured- there's no way out now.
All you are are floating red lazer data fragments, trapped inside of a complex ball.
You can't move or anthing- just wait for the old man that captured you to determine your fate.
Eventually, you fall asleep.

What feels like a few days later, you start to go insane.
You know you've only been in the pokeball for a few days, but still................ you can never tell when you're trapped in darkness.
You constantly wish you could go back home, and even start having pretend conversations with your mother- you know, just for when you escape this horrible machine.
That is, IF you ever escape this horrible machine.
The darkness slowly starts getting to you- driving you insane with greif and misery. Soon, it feels as if it's eating you alive.
But one day, you hear what could possibly be one of the most satisfying sounds you've ever heard- the familiar click of the the pokeball.
The pokeball pops open again, and you try to cry with joy when you feel your red lazer data fragments begin to materialize into a solid body again.
Slowly you sense light in your prescence, and as the red lazer wears off, you gain physical consciousness again.

Naturally, your first reaction is to look around and see what the heck is going on.
That's why you nearly jump 20 feet into the air, as the first thing you see is the old man's face right in front of yours.
"Hello there little critter!" he exclaims warmly. "I know you may be a little scared or angry, but soon I'll find a nice trainer for you!"
You give him a weird look, as if he were talking a foreign language. What the heck was he calling you 'little critter' for!
"Hey!" you exclaim. "I don't want any crap from you, just let me go!"
Or at least that's what you WOULD have said, but all that came out was
"Pika! Pika pika, pika-chu!!"

You freeze in terror, and feel as if you had just been puched in the guts.
Did you just say................ what you THOUGHT you said?
"Whoa, calm down little guy!" the old man proclaims heartily, as if nothing were wrong. "No need to get so angry! I'll just fix you up some pika-chow and call in a trainer to take care of you. Then you'll feel much better!"
Pika-chow?
A trainer to take care of me?
By the sound of it, it sounded like he thought you were a.............................
You look down at your self, and notice why you had gotten that funny feeling above your butt earlier. You had a pikachu tail!
You also had those stubby pikachu arms, those large pikachu feet, and that bright yellow pikachu torso.................
You......... you had been turned into a pikachu!

"Piiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii!!!!" you screamed, which, in human language, is about the equivalant of "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!"
The professor quickly turned to you with a confused look and asked "What's the matter little guy? You don't like pika-chow?"
That wasn't the problem at all though- no you knew who this man was!
He was professor Oak, from the world of pokemon!
And he had just recently caught you, a wild pikachu, to give to a knew trainer! This was horrible! Horrible, horrible, horrible!!!!!!

You may have been recently turned into a pikachu, but that didn't mean that, just like every other creature on this earth, you couldn't experience extreme emotions when you were upset.
The first one was fear- you couldn't think straight, and mentally, you completely broke down.
The second one was anger, which you were experiencing right now.
"Stupid professor Oak!" you screamed in a forced language. "Stupid gameboy! Stupid pokemon! Stupid everything!"
You were completley blind with rage. And that's what caused you to do what you did next.

You see, professor Oak had just left the room to get some pika-chow.
And now you were in the labratory, a pikachu on a blind rage, all alone. The results would be disastorous.
Immediately, you started destroying everything in sight. Books, computers, test tubes, you name it!
Everything was being completely and utterly destroyed.
Then you came across two test tubes- a blue one, and a red one.
Filled with rage, you smashed one against the white wall, while you dumped the other one's contents into your newly formed mouth, swished it around on your newly formed taste buds, and finally gulped it into your pikachu-sized stomach.
Which one did you drink?
121112.title: Dodge and attack!

1211121.content:
You laugh evily, and wipe the few drops of blue liquid that missed your mouth onto the ground.
"How do you like that proffessor Oak!?" you scream in your stunted language. "Nothing can stop me now!"
You feel more powerful than ever now, and even angrier than before.
Soon you find yourself jumping across the room, destroying huge objects. The energy inside your body swells up to uncontrolable amounts, and electricity goes flying through the room!
But Proffessor Oak was there to witness you drink the blue chemical, and cried "Noooo!!! Stop!!! Please, try to control yourself!"

In your blind rage, you turn over to proffessor Oak, give him one long look, and shock him.
You didn't mean to do it really, but your hatred increased when you saw him, causing your energy to swerve out of control.
Soon, Professor oak was laying there, paralyzed from the power of the shock you gave him.
You laughed evily, but suddenly, a siren went off!
You tried to react, but it was too late- in a split second, metal tentacles had squezzed themselves around you so tightly that you could hardly breathe.
Professor oak winced, and got up from the floor.
"I'm sorry little guy, but that chemical you drank was a strength enhancement chemical. And by the effects it had on you," he said surveying his completely wrecked lab, "I'd have to say it helps provoke anger and other unwanted behaviors too. Until, the anger has worn off, I'm gonna have to put you on lock down.

At first you didn't blame him for putting special guard around you- you had just destroyed his lab.
But when you saw what 'lockdown' meant, your rage suddenly returned- it was another pokeball, with a thunder insignia on the top!
"Pika!!" you cried, trying to break free.
But it was no use.
Professor Oak sighed and captured you with the pokeball, you struggling to get out thtough the whole process of your body degrading into data again.
little did you know that you would remain as data for the next week.

A week later, you were finally released from your pokeball.
You were still angry, but not to the point that you were willing to do physical harm to anything.
As you slowly regained your vision, you saw that professor oak was standing there in his newly rebuilt lab, next to a young kid wearing pajamas with spiked, black hair.
"Pikachu?" you ask.
"This is pikachu, the electric mouse pokemon." the professor explained to the kid.
"Remember to take good care of it Ash- this one will need it. It has a bad temper, but is more powerful than your average pikachu."
"Great!" he exclaimed, picking me up and squeezing me in a bear hug. "I finally get my first pokemon!"

Now this kid could think whatever he liked about you, but one thing that wouldn't change was the fact that you wouldn't let him touch you.
Ever.
"AAAAAHHH!!" Ash screamed as you dished out an electrical attack right into him. The kid fell to the ground, temporarily paralyzed.
"Next time use your rubber gloves, Ash" the professor laughed at his expense.
"I..........I'm ok................" he said weakily, getting up.
"Let's get out of here, pikachu" Ash said, slowly treading out of the lab and expecting me to follow. For once, this 'Ash' kid had a good idea.


In the future, you befriend Ash. He becomes one of the world's most famous pokemon trainers, and you become his best friend.
You two have many adventures together as well- unlocking ancient secrets, helping citizens, destroying team rocket, etc.
You don't know why, but maybe this was the natural thing to do, you being a pikachu and all. Becoming stronger than the rest with a trainer slowly became the ultimate goal.
One thing though- you ALWAYS refused to get inside pokeballs. they made you scared, and you felt walking was so much funner.
Ah well, after all of these years, being a human seems like nothing but a distant dream.
i mean, it's not like you can find a way back............ right?
1211121.title: The True Story of Pikachu

choices: Drink it now, don't wimp out on the perfect chance for revenge!
Drink it later, maybe Oak will take longer. Your stomach cant endure much of it.
1211122.content:
You wipe off the few driblets of red chemical that had dripped down your chin, and grin evily.
Nothing could stop you now!
You jump down to the floor, and look for some electrical wires. This was gonna be fun.
After searching for a bit you see a pair of black and blue wires, and shock them with all of your might. But what happens next even suprises YOU.

"Whoa!" you cry in pika-language, staring at the machine.
More electricity than you thought was even possible had been shot out of your body and into the electrical cable, causing the machine to set off like a box of fireworks.
Flames and meters and elcetrical wires went flying everywhere!
It takes several minutes for the spontanious combustions of the obliterated machine to stop going off, leaving a melting heap of metal laying on the floor.
All you can do is stare in shock, your draw dropping all of the way down.
Was it just you, or had the potion made you............ stronger?

Looking down at your foreign body in awe, you begin to realize what this meant.
If you drunk enough of that red chemical, you truly WOULD be unstoppable!!
Evil thoughts of revenge against the world already clouding your mind, you turn around and start searching frantically for another bottle of red chemicals.
"Pi!" you cry, falling over in pain. Guess there was one thing that COULD stop you.
Stomach cramps.

"Chuuuu....." you moan, holding your rubbery pikachu stomach.
Now the cramps were getting even WORSE.
You sit there in the middle of the floor, hunched over as you try to sooth your stomach. But it doesn't help.
"Piiiiiiiii!!!" you cry, as you feel a wave of unforgiving pain smash into the insides of your stomach. You felt like you were going to barf!
But suddenly, with one last, churn, your stomach instantly feels better.

"Pika pi, chu............." you say, which translates to "Well that was weird.........."
You stand up, look around.
Just as fast as it had came, the pain was gone.
Dismissing what had just happened as a side-effect of the chemical, you start to run towards the counter again, only to be stopped a second time.
Just as you were about to jump up, you felt something churn and thrash around in your stomach AGAIN.
But this time it didn't hurt.
Looking down at your stomach, you hear it gurgle again, and then suddenly fill up.

One second your stomach had felt woozy and empty, and the next second your stomach was bursting full, as if you had just eaten at a buffet!
You look down to see your belly protruding a little, and then see it gurgle again.
"Piiiiii..........." you mutter, "Pika pika pi, pikachu.........." (at this point in the story I won't type pika-text anymore, just normal text)
This translates to "Oooohhh..... Maybe I should drink the chemical later, it's giving me a lot bad side-effects........."
Looking up, you see another beaker of the red chemical, sitting on the counter right in front of your nose.

It's your choice- drink the chemical now, or later?
If you drink it later, the professor will probably get to stop you before you can snatch it.
But if you drink it now, the power to capture this whole lab will be yours............... but the price of some SERIOUS pain. You could even get poisoned from drinking too much of the stuff!

So, what do you do?
1211122.title: You drank the red one!

choices: Stay as you are- you'll need the mobility and ability to talk
Drink another- ultimate power is your only goal now
12111221.content:
Some of the more......... DARKER thoughts in your head end up winning the battle.
Who cared about stomach problems?
As long as you obtained more power, it was ok by you!
You ignore the strange churning in your stomach and jump up on top of the counter with a little bit of difficulty.
It's hard to do things that require flexibility on a full stomach.
Already planning the revenge that was soon to come, you take the second beaker of red chemical in your tiny yellow hand.
You give the concoction one last final look, and dump it into mouth, savoring the flavor.
It tasted a bit like pineapples.
Nevertheless, you gulp it all down and then the throw the bottle on the ground, ready for ultimate power and some stomach problems.
But that NEVER could've prepared you for what happened next.

Standing there, you expect that at any moment, you will feel some sort of powerful urge to attack you, like power or stomach problems.
But it doesn't happen anything like that.
First comes the power: you feel the energy in your body slolwly but surely become higher and higher, and you grow completely unstable.
Soon little shocks of electricity are shooting out of your red cheecks against your will, and you feel electricity surge freely through your entire body.
It feels good.
Powerful energy ripples through your entire body............... so much power you can hardly control it!
Little zaps of electricty start to fly uncontrollably out of your body, and soon these zaps turn into shocks. Then bolts. And then.................

"Piiiiiiikaaaaaaaaa!!!!" you scream, and release a devastating thunder attack!
The chair next becomes no longer a chair, but a puddle of melted plastic and leather.
You, a simple pikachu, had just released one of the most powerful Thunders ever recorded! And you weren't even supposed to know that move for a long time!
You smile in victory. This was gonna be easier than you thought.
But suddenly, against all beleif, your electric energy begins to increase more and more! Your body burns and your veins pulse rapidly at the sheer amounts of electrical energy being pumped through your body!
"What......?" you say in a scared tone of voice.
Now the electrcitiy was starting to fly uncontroablly out of your body in powerful blasts that knocked over heavy-duty tools.
An almost invisible sphere of electricity was even starting to form around you!

Your body begins to shake and twitch in severe degrees as electrical energy seems to start seeping through every pore in your body.
"To........ much........ power!!!!" you scream, as your body begins to become an uncontrollable rag-doll to the intense amounts of electricity that was pouring out of it.
"Please........" you beg to no one in particular, "help.........."
You start to black out at this point, as electricity starts tearing through your body like tissue, and your body gets thrown in random directions in the room.
The brightness of the sphere of electricity coming out of your body becomes an intense, searing hot white, and soon your vision goes blank.
You are a prisoner to your own, uncontrollable power. And if the power kept increasing, you would die.
"PIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII!!!!!!!!!!!!!" you scream in one last final attempt to get some attention, but it's no use.
Oak was at the store buying food, and if someone had looked into the window right then, all they would have saw was a giant ball of electricty zipping around the room, destroying the foundation of the building itself.

Then, just as you became sure that you would explode with electricity, something completely unexpected happens- you gain a little bit of control in your stomach!
"Huh?" you barely mutter. How did you do that?
Slowly, you start to get the control that you got in your stomach all over your body.
Now that you can think clearly, you squint through the light of your own electricity and spot something that makes you gasp.
You had gotten a little chubbier!
"The fat....." you say, squeezing your stomach flab with your thick hands. "It must absorb the electricity! It's like storage space!"

Now everything made sense!
Last time you drank the chemical you had gotten a little stronger, so you had gotten a little bit of fat on your stomach to store it!
Now this time you had obtained an insane amount of electricity, so to counter-act it..................
"Uh-oh" you say, looking downwards. Your stomach was bulging out more than it had a minute ago! "Oh crap!" you yell.
You were about to become a giant, fat pikachu!
You start grabbing at your body frantically, but it's no use- your stomach starts to droop downwards, and your arms and legs start to thicken. The fat was spreading like wildfire! Everytime you grabbed at a body part, the skin would stretch your hand out until you had to re-grip it. This was terrible!

Soon your butt begins to expand, and your stomach becomes like a inflated exercise ball now. It starts to take up your entire torso, even your chest.
Next your legs thicken up towards the point that they touch eachother. Weak and exhausted, you fall over, letting your entire body bounce, and then shake like jello.
Your arms thicken up next to your sides, as well as your hips, and your arms start to bend into a 45-degree angle.
The whole time you look at your body in amazement and think "This is pretty awful, but atleast I'm not exploding into electrical particles right now........"

Finally, the rest of your body thickens out.
Your checks become large and filled with fat, as long as your feet and arms. Even your tail has a little bit of fat on it! Everywhere you look it's the exact same thing- large, round, rubbery fat!
"Ugh........." you moan to yourself. You are now a giant, fat pikachu, that can hardly even move. You can stand up, but you feel your strength drain right out of you. There was so much fat you had to carry around- at least a hundred pounds of it. And pikachus normally only weigh 13 pounds!
You grunt, and your entire body jiggles. There's just so much fat!
You stare at your body, and just drop your jaw in amazement. There must be AT LEAST twice as much of you now! It was like you had gained a limb!
Surely you had to be the biggest, fattest pikachu in the world! Your stomach was like a vast hill off rubbery yellow fat in front of your eyes............ that definitely wasn't natural!

After checking out your body for while, you learn more about what fat feels like on the body.
But you still can't get used to it.
Then you get a thought- if you had all of this fat to contain electricity inside of your body, then wouldn't that mean that you had insanely powerful lightning still?
You concentrate the sluggish energy in your body and zap a wall.
Much to your suprsie, it blows a hole in it!
"Woah!" you cry.
If you had that kind of energy from being fat, then imagine how powerful you would be if you got some training!
You take one look at your body, and grunt. You may have obtained tons of electrical power from becoming a giant rubber blob, bu that didn't mean you would be getting some physical training anytime soon.You'd probably get stuck at stretches.

You look around, and survey what has happened to you since that one fateful day about a week ago.
You started out as a human boy, and now your a giant, fat pikachu with insane electric powers that's stuck inside a ruined lab due to his own weight.
Not good.
However, turning back was becoming an unrealistic option now.
Besides, there's NO WAY you could burn off all of this fat- it kept you alive by storing electricity in it.
You have two choices now- you could stay as you are now, with insane electrical powers and slight mobility, or you could drink ANOTHER beaker of that chemical stuff. Sure you would become a giant ball, but everything that got in your way would be incenerated immediately. End of story.

So which will it be?
12111221.title: Drink it now, don't wimp out on the perfect...

Get some blue chemical- it could help!
121112212.content:
You jiggle your belly a bit, and grunt.
Fat didn't matter.
Ultimate power, the power to disintegrate anything you wanted in your path......... now that you were a pikachu, that became your ultimate goal.
Nothing else really mattered, so long as you were more powerful.
So, without further ado, you took another beaker off the counter. You had to throw all of your strength towards the counter just to lean towards it. Sure your electricity was powerful, but that didn't mean it could retrieve things without blowing them up for you.

You take the lid off the top, and sniff the concoction with your highly-sensitive pikachu nose.
Smelled like pineapple too.
You take a deep breath, and then pour the whole drink into your mouth, without it even touching the tip of your tounge. You gulp down the chemical and let your hand go limp, dropping the beaker and letting it roll off the side of your mountainous belly.
You lick your fingers greedily, and then sit back and watch the show.
This was a life-changing decision right here, and you were scared about it. What if things didn't go the way you imagined them too? What if you suffocated from being so fat? Would the fat somehow prevent you from using your power effectively? What if-?

You are suddenly cut off as your belly suddenly EXPLODES an inch forward, and then starts to gurgle.
By the way your body was bouncing, you'd think you were in an earthquake!
Your old fat you'd had was content and full of electrical energy, but this new lining of fat was ravernous and hungry. And if your fat came first this time before the electricity........... uh-oh.

Clutching your stomach in fear, you feel your fat suddenly start EXPANDING outwards, as if you were some sort of balloon.
Pikachu skin is very rubbery, but not too the the point where-
Suddenly your thought is cut off, as you feel a disturbing and yet exciting new sensation. Your belly is finally touching the ground, pushing your meaty legs to the side. You grab your belly, only to have your hand de-gripped from it's yellow, bouncy goodness again. This was disturbing............. but also very exciting, like riding on some sort of roller coaster that is inside of you. Terrifying and cool.

Soon your butt and legs begin to inflate outwards too, and you begin to feel the stretch on your insides as they both quiver.
As I've said before, creepy but and weird but cool and exciting.
Your arms begin to inflate as well, and soon you can't carry their weight anymore- they're stuck at what is now about a 60-degree angle.

Suddenly, right as your cheeks are becoming puffed up, the top parts of your legs and arms begin to be sucked into the increasingly noticable sphere shape of your body!
I guess your skeleton just couldn't hold the vast amount of fat together any longer.
Soon, your feet aren't even touching the ground- just the fat-filled curve of your lower stomach determines how high you are.
Your arms become immobile too- the rolls of fat all squish together, and leave no space for your joints to work. Soon, your arms are completely sucked into the fat, leaving nothing but your incredibly thick hands to pivot slighly on the wrists.
The same thing happens to your feet too- now they can only pivot on the ankles.

After a while, you finally rip yourself away from your body on its quest to become sphere shaped. You can't look around much now though, since your neck has long since dissapeared.
You notice one thing though- you're filling up the room! If this keep up, soon you'll burst out of the walls.
The foundations are pretty weak after that first incident.
Eventually it happens- with a sickening crack, the walls and ceiling of professor Oak's lab break open, letting your sides bounce out so that they quiver like jello.
You seriously feel like you're about to pass out at any second now for two reasons- first off because your body is so large and takes up so much energy.
Second off, because you're so dang hungry!

Your beady black eyes dart around- but there's no food in sight.
You feel like you wanna cry.
But suddenly, something miraculous happens- your electrical energy starts to build up! You almost had already forgoten about how it rippled through your body. This time when it rippled though, it caused your fat to jiggle when it passed by.
Suddenly, with a humoungous BOOM!!, some sort of energy rumbled deep within the core of your body. Your heart skips a beat, and you gasp- you KNEW what that terrible and beatiful power was- the ultimate thunderbolt.
Megabolt.

The rest of your body filled out with normal high-powered energy, unlike the stuff in your core, and soon you felt as energetic as any other person you might think of.
But damn.................. were you hungry or what!
You know that you're a fat pikachu the size of a house, but still............ you didn't know this kind of hunger was even possible!
For cying out loud, you felt like you could eat a whale! And you probably could!

Desperately searching for some sort of edible item, you see two tings- the city and the lab wreckage.
The lab wreckage still had blue plastic beakers in it, and they could either harm or help you.
On the other hand, the city had enough food to last you a few days.

Which do you pick?
121112212.title: Drink another- ultimate power is your only goal...

You weren't sure how you did it, but you were able to get some of the blue chemical to drink. You drank it, but you felt your belly filling up more than just what you drank. You weren't sure what was happening, but you knew one thing: it was taking care of the hunger.

It actually felt pleasant, like you were having a good meal. It felt heavy in your stomach. The effect kept going, however, and you began to feel fuller and fuller. You actually got a little bigger just from the liquid filling your stomach! Just when you felt like you were about to burst, the liquid stopped filling your stomach.

The blue chemical was also helping you get used to the energy surging through your body. You could actually feel it circling around in your sphere of a body. In fact, despite all the fat between your core body and the outer edge of your body, you could still feel the ground and the gentle breeze. That must mean the electricity was connecting to your nervous system. You were beginning to involuntarily control some of the electricity stored inside you.

Then it hit you: the electricity must have also helped you get the bottle. Little did you know that you could also control static charge. That static charge allows you to move things across your body as long as they're touching your body. You unknowingly used it to take a bottle of blue chemical up to your head to drink it!

You think about moving forward, and try to do it, but your limbs are too small to move anymore. When you try, however, you feel electric pulses start to move your fat and actually roll you forward. Your electricity was now your source of mobility, and you were glad to have one.

You had gotten accustomed to your new body, so now you wanted to try something more. You tried a simple electric attack, the effort you would normally use for a thundershock, on a nearby house, and it nearly obliterated the house, leaving flaming ruins. Though barely noticeable, when you did that, you felt fat shrink down just slightly.

You loved your power, and you were glad you drank that last bottle of red chemical. You can finally take revenge on the world for getting you into this mess! You could also try to find a way to grow your power even more! You decided to...

1322.content:
Matt was an average kid. Average grades, average height, average tastes. He was the kind of kid who could willingly blend in with a crowed if he wanted. Problem was, That wasn't what Matt wanted. All his life he'd been forced to go from one point to the next. One grade to another, one location to another, and all the while following a path he didn't want to set foot on to begin with.
The realization of this fact had made him surlier day by day, his foster parents barely noticed though as they only cared about him following the rules, doing as everybody else did, and staying out of trouble. It was when Matt had reached the age of 18 and was just wrapping up High School that he knew this was too much. He couldn't stand it any longer. He needed an out, but he could see no hope for it.

It was a sullen gray day as he trudged home from school, looking like it could rain at any moment. He kicked his dirty read sneakers through the mud, not caring about it since the shoes were so worn they were about ready for the trash anyway. his dirty blue-jeans too were badly shredded in places and only barely enough to be considered tasteful and not trash. His old brown jacket was pulled tightly over his yellow shirt. He brushed the brown hair from his eyes as he looked down the dirt road that traveled along the end of town between the last few houses and the woods beyond. Many times he'd thought about running off and hiding in the woods, but every time reality had squashed the idea.

As he stared at the dark trees though, he thought he saw something shining among them. For a moment he wasn't sure he'd seen anything, but then he spotted it again. Whatever it was it wasn't too far off. Figuring his foster parents wouldn't be too mad if he was a little late, Matt stepped off the road and angled for the woods and the strange thing he'd seen.
Despite it being close, it was still a good bit though the thick bushes, and he was damp from all the water on the leaves by the time he reached the spot where he'd seen the shining object.

What was it?

Erin was a chubby Vaporeon. She wore a sky blue sweater, so she could cover up her almost obvious muffin top. She wasn't disgustingly fat, just going through her Freshman Fifteen, but she actually liked it, even though she was embarrassed about her appearance. She was around 6 feet tall, outranking her Jolteon father, and her Glaceon mother. She was a huge (figuratively!) fan of anime and videogames, mostly games from Capcom's old group Clover, like Viewtiful Joe!
Even though she was a gamer, she was pretty smart, and even full of useless information, like how Roosevelt's poor eyesight saved his life from an assassin. She was a bookworm, and loved banned books and Young Adult ones. But that's all she let on about her life...
The lovely vaporeon Erin was an FA. She loved to binge on a regular basis, usually with the intent of gaining a shirt size, because she found that skinny girls weren't sexy; they just looked like skeletons, and were weaker. Her muffin top was where most of her weight gain went, but her breasts were already good enough, at a C-cup. Her booty was tight at her current weight, much to her chagrin. She wanted it to get soft and jiggly, to impress a local Gallade in her college class, Tony. She knows he liked her muffin top, and had hidden his crush very sloppily, so Erin couldn't help but find it humorous.
...but cute as well! She also loved Tony: he was around 25 pounds overweight, but he was obviously not bothered. He was also a fan of her favorite anime, Angel Beats, and was a chubby chaser!
She decided she'd gain more for Tony over spring break. Her goal was 20 pounds before the break ends.
The question is: how?

Erin had heard that the key to losing was to eat regularly for a few days, then eat nothing for one day, so her metabolism burns the usual weight without realizing. After a few minutes of thought, she decided to do the exact opposite: starve, then binge. ~sounds legit,~ she thought.
After her first binge on her third day of spring break, she had gained... 6 pounds?! ~YES!!~ she felt her booty, which had gotten half an inch larger. She felt her chest as it seemed to have grown a little, her bra chafing. Her favorite part HAD to be her gut. It stuck out almost 2 inches now, and seemed to get 2 small love handles from her recent binge. At this rate, she'd probably beat her goal by four whole pounds!!

Her breasts now reached a whole DD cup; her booty had grown 6 inches out behind her. Her belly had become a fully fat one; clocking in at an amazing 18 inches out in front of her now. Her love handles multiplied into 6 of them. It started to hang, as now it pushed her sweater up so that her breasts were barely covered by it.

*meanwhile, at Tony's house*

Tony the fat Gallade woke up from his dream of Erin getting fatter-which just came true. He had been gaining for Erin, unbeknownst to her, he had been fattening himself up too. ([~]=your name)
[~] was wandering around Viridian Forest. The 15 year old had caught wind of a Venusaur being spotted in the area. Since the Bulbasaur family was their favorite Pokemon, and since they don't live in Pallet Town, [~] told their parents and headed into the Forest. Though, they honestly didn't care about their (son/daughter) ran off into the woods at night. In their minds, it was just one less mouth to feed.

"Now, if I were a Venusaur where would I be..." They said to themselves, holding up a flashlight and scratching at a vortex like birthmark on their cheek. Walking along, something jumped across the path, startling [~]. They dropped the flashlight, shattering it and leaving them in total darkness. "Human!" A sudden voice boomed, causing their birthmark to glow. "State your reason for trespassing on Veanusaurs land!" [~] began to sweat. "Well, y-you see. I-I was hoping to catch a Venusaur...so maybe they could help me win a battle against my dad...and earn a little respect from him..." [~] responded, trying to hide the sadness in their voice. "Why must you earn your fathers respect?" The voice asked. "W-well...I thought maybe if I earned his respect...I might get some love from my family...instead of a bottle to head..." They said. "...come with me." The voice said. [~] felt a scaly, clawed hand take theirs and pulled them along.

"Uh, sir? Where are you-" a sudden brightness cut [~] off. The entire area was as clear as day. Grass and Bug Pokemon were frolicking and playing with each other, while some were asleep. [~] then noticed who had lead them here; a Sceptile. "Venusaur!" He yelled. Suddenly, a Venusaur emerged from the woods and walked over. "Sceptile, glad to see you again." The Venusaur asked, her voice smooth and caring. That's when she noticed [~]. "Sceptile. Why did...no. Sceptile, they aren't them." Venusaur said. "But, look! Look at their cheek! They bare our crest! It is them!" Sceptile said, showing her [~]'s cheek. "...Sceptile. I'd like to speak to them; privately." Said Venusaur. Sceptile nodded, leaving. Venusaur then indicated for [~] to follow her.

Soon, the two were in a sort of den. "Young one. I must apologize for what my ex-mate did. He's been trying to appease me ever since I lost..." She didn't finish, and began to tear up. "Hey, hey. It's alright. I...I know your pain." [~] said, reassuringly. "What do you mean?" She asked, looking up with tears in her eyes. "Well, you see...I haven't felt a loss of a loved one...but I feel neglect. I came out here to catch you and hopefully have you help earn my dads respect...and love...who am I kidding. I'm never gonna get his love." Said [~], finally breaking down. "Oh. You poor baby." She said, rubbing their back with her vines. That's when a light bulb went off. "[~], I have an idea that will help us both. But, I need your permission to do so." She said. "What*sniffles*do you have in mind?" They asked. "I...I want you to become my child; we'll be much happier afterwards." She said. [~] thought it over, before nodding. "Okay. Here we go." Venusaur wrapped her vines around [~] and hoisted them up onto her flower. "Just relax. And everything will be fine." She said.

Suddenly, the petals closed around [~]. They began to panic, trying to push the petals open. "Shh...Shh...mommy' got you~" said Venusaur, stroking [~] through her petals. [~], slowly, began to calm down. "Are you ready?" "Yes." Suddenly, a green powder began to fill up the "room." As [~] inhaled, their skin slowly became a green-blue, becoming turquoise in some spots and on their birthmark. [~]'s hands and feet became paws, their fingers and toes becoming white claws. Their head changed, becoming wider, their nose moving just above their mouth, becoming two holes; and their eyes becoming crimson red. Their ears migrated to the top of their head as [~]'s canine teeth became fangs, hanging out of their mouth. Lastly, a big, green bulb grew out of their back as they shrink and become younger, too.

Venusaur opened up her flower to find a five-year old Bulbasaur flopped out on the center. "Wakes wakey, [~]." They opened their eyes and looked over their body, and smiled. "This...is incredible! I...I love it!" [~] said, hoping off her flower. "I'm glad you love it~" Venusaur said, walking over. "Thanks momma." [~] said, moving up close, nuzzling their new mom. "You're welcome. Now, how 'bout we get some sleep?" [~] nodded. Venusaur moved to the center of the den and sat down. [~] walked over and did the same, resting near her head. "Goodnight, momma." "Goodnight, sweetie." She said, kissing [~] on the forehead. Soon, the two had fallen asleep, happy to be together as a family.

152111.content:
You are a 14-year old girl named Shelby.
And you are the average kid in the world of pokemon.
Or at least, that's how you think of yourself.
I mean, there are lots of different types of people- hikers, beautys, bug collectors, and even gym leaders!
But whenever you look at yourself, you just think "I don't look like any type of person at all! I just look really........ normal."
And that's what drove you into the weirdest adventure of your life: a quest to become un-normal.
And at about the point that you were in life, you were pretty sure you'd try just about anything.
Even changing your physical appearance.
Well, let's just say you got your wish...... but a a high price.
You were about to become the strangest person of all. In a way, you weren't even going to be a person when you were done with yourself.
You were going to become a pokemon.

The idea hit you on a cool, spring afternoon.
You were sitting on your front porch, swinging on a bench and watching the breeze blow through the endless sea of grass in front of you.
Recently, you had obtained a jigglypuff- the baloon pokemon. It was a male jigglypuff, but it was pretty hard to tell the difference.
But still, you liked it a lot........... envied it a little too.
Everytime you went training with it, it felt good to give commands, but you thought it would be a lot funner to be in battle yourself!
You shook the thought out of your head though- you were a human, and humans never get to battle.
Ever.
So that's why the idea hit you- you could become a pokemon and battle yourself!
It would be so cool!

"Hey, Mr. Jiggles!" you called as you removed your ear plugs, after watching the pokemon sing one of its melodies.
You had nick-named your jigglypuff Mr. Jiggles because you found it funny.
Your mom didn't appreciate it though, and you were pretty sure it annoyed your jigglypuff too.
It was just kinda one of those on-going jokes.
"I have an idea" you announced as he approached you from the steps on the porch.
"What if I became a pokemon?"
Mr. Jiggles stared at you with a weird look on his face as if you had just spoken to him in french.
Or german.
Or possibly even japanese.

"Puff?" asked Mr. Jiggles.
You couldn't exactly translate what he was saying, but you had a pretty good idea of it from the look on his face.
"You know, if I transformed into a jigglypuff like you or something! Not only could we talk, but I could battle and train and go on all sorts of adventures! Anything to get away from my life as a stupid, normal kid!"
"Jiggly?" Mr Jiggles said, raising an eyebrow. He didn't look like he beleived you.
You have to admit, you wouldn't have beleived that if anyone else had told me that either. It's impossible to turn into a pokemon!
But that's where your brilliant idea came from.

"Remember Bill, that famous professor that lives down next to the beach? The one that invented the pokemon storage system?"
Mr. Jiggles shuddered- he HATED the pokemon storage system. To him, it was more like a jail cell.
Still, he slowly nodded his head, one eyebrow lifted.
"Well, a few years ago, he invented a machine that switches your body into a pokemon's! It's perfect! All I gotta do is get in there, flip on the machine, and BAM! I'm suddenly a jigglypuff!"
Mr Jiggles just froze. He seemed to have just gone into shock.
"It's ok Mr. Jiggles....." you say playfully, scratching the pokemon inbetween it's ears.
"It's just an experiment. If I wanted too, I could just get in that machine and switch back. Perfectly harmless!"

You of course had no intention on switching back, unless you got really home-sick.
Still, this satisfied Mr. Jiggles, especially since he loved being scratched between the ears, and he replied with a cheefrul "Puff!"
You laughed, and went back inside for dinner. This was gonna be great! You could become a beautiful singer, a powerful balloon pokemon, and have an exciting life with your friend if you went through with this!
Totally worth it.
So that night, you planned on how to get yourself to the machine.

Would you sneak in there at the middle of night to use it and risk getting caught..........
or ask Bill with the likely chanche of getting turned down?
152111.title: Jigglypuff, the awesomest of them all!

choices: Needles are the way to go- less chance of electricution
Machine, definitely. Who knows what the chemicals will do to you?
1521111.content:
You decided to sneak in at night- you didn't want anyone knowing what you were doing anyways.
And besides, what were you thinking, thinking that Bill would just let you use his machine like that?
Totally dumb.
So that night, you stay up late, keeping Mr. Jiggles up with you.
You wanted him to be there for your big transformation, right?
You decide to sneak out at 12:00 at night.

During that night, you searched for ways to make the time pass by without getting bored and falling asleep.
You tried to teach Mr. Jiggles how to play go-fish, but that didn't work since he couldn't read, and kept blowing the deck away when he got angry.
You also tried to teach him tag, which would have worked, but you were stuck inside your room.
Tag is no fun when you have only a few feet to seperate eachother.
But eventually, the time came- it was 12:00, and you could finally sneak out!
Actually, it was only 11:50, but you were sure it wouldn't hurt to be ten minutes early. Besides, you didn't think your patience would last much longer anyways.

Dressed in a black t-shirt and jeans, you sneak out the front door and into the front yard with your jigglypuff tip-toeing closely behind.
This was gonna be fun.
You take a left, and hurridly jog down Route 8, using the occasional street-light to lamp your way.
This was so exciting!
When Bill's lab finally comes into view, you take a deep breath of the cool night air, and quickly take a look back.
This was it. This was pretty close to a life-changing decision, and it was happening TONIGHT. No turning back now.

Quickly you jog down a slope and up to a side-window in Bill's house.
The last time you would ever use your human legs outside was now. When you re-emerged, you would be using Jigglypuff feet, not your own.
When you re-emerged, you wouldn't be yourself anymore- you'd be something better, cooler, even funner.
You would be a jigglypuff.
As you force open the window of the lab and drop onto the steel floor, you shuuder- not from the impact, but from the pure terror and excitement pulsing through your head.
You were really doing it!
You take a look around, and notice the room was pretty much empty, except for a rack of needles with liquids inside of them, and the morphing machine with a white canvas draped over it.
Bill must have taken most of his research home.

Still, out of pure curiosity, you check out the needles.
What was their purpose?
You figured they would be test chemicals or something, but gasp in confusion when you read the label "Pokemon DNA"
So there was a different way to transform!
You look through the needles really fast, and finally find one that's labled "Jigglypuff"
So what should you do?
Use the suspicious chemiclas, or use the giant machine?
They both seemed pretty dangerous.

Squinting through the darkness, you say "Well Mr. Jiggles? What should I choose?"
You weren't quite sure if he understood if he understood you not, but all he did was shrug and nervously rock back and forth.
He knew either way would be pretty scary.

So, I guess the choice is up to you- use needles, or use a machine?
1521111.title: Sneak in at night- that'll get you in for s...

15211112.content:
You take one look at the needles, and put them back- they could be deadly!
And besides, just because they had DNA, that doesn't mean they would transform you.
The machine was obviously the safer and more garunteed way to go.
"Ok, Mr. Jiggles" you say, tearing the canvas off of the machine.
"Prepare to meet the new and improved me!"

You smile as you see the giant chrome machine in front of you- it was truly magnificent.
Even though all it was connected to were a few air/water pipes and elecrtical wires, you could tell by its giant pod-like structure that this baby was capable of incredible feats: such as morphing people into pokemon.
After turning it on, you look at a pad on the side, and read a small strip of text that asks you to type in the name of the pokemon that you wanted to stabilize.
You type in the word "Jigglypuff" and the pad buzzes green, making the door slide open in the front.

You feel like you're in some sort of alien movie or something as you watch lights flash up in random patterns, and the door slides open to reveal a thin layer of mist.
It's absolutely georgous, a modern work of art. And it was about to do something amazing to you.
Stepping inside, you look around to find yourself in a steamy, metal closet-sized space.
It's pretty bare, except for some air/water pipes sticking out near your knees. You suppose the professor prefered to breathe while experimenting.
You turn around and see Mr. Jiggles staring at you in complete awe.
You were really going to do it.

"Ok......." you say shakily, fear filling your voice.
"Jigglypuff, please hit the red button on the right. Then hit the blue one on the other side when it tells you to."
Mr. Jiggles stares at you in terror, but pushes the button like he's told.
The door sudddenly slides shut, trapping you in there until the process was complete.
Your last moments of humanity were now.

As a light flickers on, you stare sadly down at your hands.
Your mom had always said you had such beautiful hands............ but that didn't matter anymore. You still wanted to carry through with this.
You, a very normal 14-year old girl, were about to become a jigglypuff.
You felt both excited and proud, with your fear edging away as a comforting and warm mist filled the room.
There was no turning back now.

Suddenly, the lightbulb above you starts to brighten in intensity!
"What the-!" you yell.
Before you can finish your sentence, a giant white-hot flash that fills the whole room goes off, knocking you to the ground!
Your ears are ringing, and your breath has been knocked out of you. The flash has also effectively made you blind, and paralyzed you.
Suddenly, another flash goes off, and then another!
You try to scream in pain, but you can't: something in the mist seems to completely take your breath away.

The flashes keep on repeating over and over again, for about five minutes.
But to you, it feels like an eternity!
The flahses keep smashing your body around like they're beating you up or something, but you can't feel your body parts melting and shifting shape due to a strange numbness.
Your eyes grow huge, and your legs and arms shrink down.
Also, your fingers and your toes melt together as your torso becomes rounder like a ball.
But probably the worst part is how your skin turns a pinkish shade, and becomes strange and rubbery.
To this day, the thought STILL chills you to the bones.

But the weirdest part to change is your eternal organs.
Your stomach becomes a giant and hallow, and combined with the ruber skin, it's able to fill up with air and stretch like a baloon.
It's almost as if god had forgoten to add organs that attatched to your skin or something in there.
Also your vocal cords changed to a weird looking lump in your throat, vocal cords that meant for two things: singing and saying the words 'jiggilypuff'

Finally, as your body was melting into it's last few changes, your body began to shrink.
It kind of feels weird, like falling down a botomless pit.
Your feet also begin to lengthen and shrink at the same time, causing you to lose your balance and slip.
Which way did you slip?

15432111.title: Meet the rest of your team

choices: It stopped. You were caught, but your pokemon weren't going to let him get away.
You broke free just in time, and gave the finishing blow to Klinklang.
154321112.content:
You decided that since you were a pokemon, a house for humans would start to get difficult to live in. You weren't a human anymore, so you were quick to abandon any human-specific activities, behaviors and possessions. Because of this, it didn't take too long for you to say, "Let's live in the wild, everyone!". Lucario and Machoke were quick to agree with you, saying, "I'm in." Charizard nodded in agreement, as did Hawlucha.

Sceptile and Zorua were both a little more skeptical. "What about food? It can be hard to find food out there!" Sceptile said. Zorua agreed, saying, "Yeah, and it's nice to have shelter. You don't have to be human to stay in a house."

You were adamant, though, and you said, "With seven of us working, food won't be a problem! There are plenty of caves around, so if we need shelter, we can easily find it!" You said. Sceptile said, "Alright. I'll go wherever you go." Zorua said, "Fine, I'll go too. It might be fun to play tricks on some wild pokemon!"

It was decided, and the seven of you left the house behind. You said, "Since I'm a pokemon, and not a trainer anymore, I'm not using pokeballs, so you can say goodbye to those!" Most of your pokemon didn't seem to care either way, but then you added, "You all are also no longer my pokemon, so you don't have to take orders from me or even stay with me."

At that comment, Lucario almost immediately said, "I'll always stay by your side." Charizard said, "Yeah! You may not be a trainer anymore, but we're still friends." Hawlucha added, "Besides, you were good at being a trainer, so you'd be a good leader now!" All of your pokemon were in agreement that they not only wanted to stay with you, but wanted you to lead them.

You were taken aback by how much your pokemon cared about you, and you said, "In that case, let's explore the world, and find the perfect place to live!" Your pokemon cheered, and soon you were walking together, almost like a herd.

The area where you lived was pretty peaceful and sparsely populated, so trainers and even other wild pokemon were an uncommon sight. Most wild pokemon were intimidated by the size of your group and the power of its members, so they steered clear.

The environment was modestly forested with occasional meadows. You were travelling along the foot of a forested mountain range. Many of the rivers and streams that you crossed had waterfalls nearby. There were also frequent caves in the mountain range.

The area wasn't lush, so food wasn't easy to find, but there was still enough to hold you over. There were occasional berry bushes, and plenty of foliage and bugs, though everyone had different dietary needs. For the most part, foraging worked, though, and berries were surprisingly filling.

That night, the seven of you slept in a cave. Hawlucha slept alone, facing the entrance. You and machoke slept together with Lucario not too far off, between you and the cave entrance. Charizard slept by himself nearby, as did Sceptile. Zorua didn't want to sleep alone, so he cuddled up next to Sceptile.

The next morning, the seven of you set off once again. This time, however, you ran into someone. He appeared to be in his thirties. He was wearing a lab coat and glasses. He looked like a scientist or researcher. "Ahh, just what I'm looking for!" He said as he looked at you, then threw a pokeball, with a Klinklang popping out.

The other six wanted to interfere, but you said, "I got this. Fighting is super-effective against steel. Besides, you can't interfere if you wanted. I'm the one he wants, and we can only fight one at a time."

The rest of your team watched with bated breath as you fought. You began with a brick break. It just came naturally to you, and Klinklang definitely took damage. He was using iron defense, however, and he was getting harder and harder to do damage too. He then used gear grind. "Ow, that hurts!" You said, though the man only heard, "Choke, machoke!".

The battle continued, and you were starting to feel fatigued. At that moment, the scientist man pulled out an ultra ball. He meant business. You were about to see the full effect of role-reversal as he threw the ball at you, and you felt yourself freeze in place before everything went dark. You didn't feel the process of going into the pokeball at all. It just instantaneously went from outside to inside from your perspective.

It felt like you were in some sort of cage, and you struggled to break free with all your might. You were furious, and even if you were caught, you weren't going to give your new trainer an easy time once you got out. Your pokemon watched in horror as the ball wiggled, once, twice, three times, and...

15432111221.content:
Lucario said, "He's actually really nice. Let's see if he has anything to say." The professor saw the pokemon looking at him, and he said, "I'm sorry guys. I didn't realize that you were all Machoke's friends. It's just that Machoke is just the kind of pokemon I'm looking for to help with my research, and I really wanted him. Catching pokemon is usually the only way to go."

Everyone still seemed pretty mad at him. Lucario said he was nice, and he seemed to trust the scientist, but everyone was still upset that he almost took away their leader. Either way, the scientist said, "I'm sorry we got off to a rough start, Machoke. Let me introduce myself. My name is Professor Mahogany How about you and your friends come with me to my lab, and I can show you my research. I'll even give you some food to make up for it."

Since Lucario trusted him, you told the others to come with the scientist with you. The others were starting to get relaxed. Even though the scientist couldn't hear any speech from you or your friends, he still seemed to understand you.

The eight of you walked, and the scientist told you his story. "I used to work at Silph Co. after I got my phd, and I was one of the researchers who worked on the first master ball!" He started. "I didn't like it there, because we didn't work directly with pokemon, so once I had saved up enough, I left. Since then, I got my first pokemon, a Klink, and that was the pokemon you just fought as a Klinklang. Working with Kilnklang, I've been building my very own lab! I want to be the kind of professor that gives trainers their first pokemon someday, but I'm also interested in research projects."

While he was going on, you and the others just listened and followed him. Soon enough, you came upon a clearing in the forest that was against the mountains. On the side of a cliff was the most amazing building you've ever seen! It was built into the cliff. The outside part was a huge, windowed half cylinder. There was a waterfall above the building that cascaded onto the roof then flowed off the sides, framing the windows.

The scientist took you to an entrance on the bottom. Inside it looked like a lobby. Everything looked new and open. There was a lot of glass and metal architecture, adding to the open feeling. At the back of the building was a set of double doors leading to a hall. It looked like a hospital, except the rooms were labs filled with experiments.

The scientist took you and your friends to an elevator, went to the top, and then he took you back down the hall to the front of the building. This floor had a big table, and the scientist then said, "Let me get you something to eat, then I can talk to you guys about what I do."

Soon enough, all of you were eating. The scientist sure knew his stuff, and he got foods specifically tailored to each pokemon, based on what he knew about all of their species. The food was delicious and the scientist was glad to have guests. He healed Klinklang and brought him out. Klinklang apologized to you, and you shrugged it off, saying "It's all good."

"As I've told you, I'm a scientist and researcher." Professor Mahogany started. "Here, I've started my lab to do research on pokemon. I'm particularly interested in the source of power for pokemon. My research involves being able to enhance a pokemon's natural powers beyond what mere training can do. The problem is that I need willing test subjects. When I saw you, Machoke, I saw lots of potential. I'd like you to be my first test subject. I have something prepared that would theoretically make you more powerful than you can even imagine! I just need to test it. Your friends can stay, too, if you'd like, and I might even have experiments for them as I continue my research. If you don't want to, that's alright. You guys would still be welcome as guests. So what do you say?"

You decided to talk to your pokemon friends about it, but all of them seemed to be in agreement that your judgement would decide this. You ultimately decided to...

1543211122111.content:
Professor Mahogany said, "We're going to start with some tests of your current physical strength.". You nod happy to oblige, so Mahogany said, "Don't worry everyone else, I'll have your friend back in no time! Feel free to make yourselves at home or let yourselves out." he said as he threw a key to the other Machoke. "This is for the front door. Feel free to let yourselves in if you need anything. I'll have Klinklang help you right away!"

Your friends then left, Machoke giving you a big hug before they went to explore the wild. Soon, Mahogany had you following him. He took you to one of the middle floors, and you noticed the elevator rotating. This place was even bigger than you thought. He took you down another hallway, then had you go through a set of double doors on the left, one of only two entryways on that side of the hall. Writing above the door said, "Examination Room."

You walked in, and were amazed by the sheer size of the room. It was like a large gymnasium, and the floors were shiny new hardwood. The room was well lit, and on one of the walls, there was a double-layered window, and a door leading to the room on the other side. Mahogany said, "Wait here while I get the equipment." You waited in the large room. It felt sanitary and bright like a doctors office, but it was huge like a gym. You noticed that the walls were some sort of metal, probably steel.

You didn't have to wait as long as you thought, as the professor had already come back with a forklift loaded with a massive crate containing some equipment. To begin with, he grabbed a spool of metal cable. "Can you hold this for me?" He said, giving you the spool. You oblige, and hold the spool so that he could pull the end of the cable. The end had a heavy, cast iron latch on it, and he took it to a ring that appeared to be fastened to the wall. He then walked into the other room with the window.

"First we will begin testing physical strength!" He said through an intercom. "We'll begin with tensile strength. When I tell you to, can you pull on the rope as hard as you can?" You thought it was quite mundane, but you shrugged and grabbed the rope, pulling it hard as if it were a tug of war. Mahogany then began furiously typing at a computer, making notes and recording data.

He had you do it a few more times before he moved onto the next test. He tested how much you could lift with both arms by having you lift massive weights until you couldn't manage. He said as you drank the bright red fluid. The instant it hit your stomach, you felt something surging through you. Your muscles tingled, and you didn't feel like you could sit still.

He reached around and grabbed the Luxury Ball clipped onto his belt and released [~] from his ball. "Sorry, [~]. We got distracted." Zorua said, apologetically. "With what exactly? Wait, where are we?" [~] asked, looking around. "A Poke-Sumo dojo, Master." Lucario answered. "Poke-Sumo. Hm, I don't know. It doesn't sit right with me. Hey, where's Machoke? And Sceptile. And Charizard?" [~] asked. As if on cue, Machoke came back into the room to grab something, and noticed [~] standing there. "[~]! When did-" "What the H happened to you!?" [~] shouted, cutting Machoke off. "Well, Machoke, Sceptile, and Charizard are becoming Sumo's. Duh." Zorua answered, and received a bop on the head from Lucario.

Meanwhile, [~] was hugging Machoke's, and suddenly began to whimper. "[~]...what's wrong?" "Machoke...why? Why did you do this?" Machoke felt bad and pulled away to face [~]. "I...I don't know. I got caught up in the moment and...I'm sorry." He held his head in shame. [~], upset at seeing him upset, put a finger underneath Machoke's chin and raised it up. Before he could respond, [~] kissed him; and Machoke kissed back.
After about 15 seconds, [~] pulled away and stared into Machoke's eyes. "When's the last time we did that?" [~] asked. Just as Machoke opened his mouth to answer, Hariyama came into the room. "Well, well. Who's this? A friend of yours?" Hariyama asked. "[~]; Hariyama. Hariyama; [~]." Hariyama smiled at [~] and stuck out his hand for him to shake. [~] gave a smile and took it, but, as they shook, [~] began to squeeze Hariyama's hand. "Ow, strong...grip you got there." He said, pulling his hand away. "I assume you were the one who went and made my mate a diabetic, didn't you, pudgy?" [~] remarked in an angry tone. "Yes, yes I did. Why? You want to join?" "Oh. Hahahahahahaha! Ah, No." [~] responded. "Okay, then. Come, Machoke. We need to get finish your physical." Machoke began to follow Hariyama, [~] gabbed his hand and pulled him back. Machoke turned to face him and ask what was that for, but [~]'s face said it all; don't do it. "Machoke? You coming? Or does gay-bo (don't take this seriously, it's just for dramatization) think other wise?" Hariyama said. "Careful, or I'll break the other one, too." [~] said under his breath. Now, Machoke was torn. Either finish what he started. Or stop what he never wanted in the first place.

It took about ten minutes, but he finally reached a decision. "I'm gonna go with-"

It landed on one of the rocks before sliding into the soil. You huff while turning around to walk away. You didn't notice the light purple slime coming into the open air. You turn after hearing a bubbling sound to see two to three buckets worth of slime. You look on curiously before seeing the slime lunge at you leg.

          You panic and fall to the floor while trying to kick the goo off. It only spreads with a warm feeling, dissolving clothes and any man made item on you. As the sock and shoe became nothing but small particles, you notice your toes fusing together and your leg thickening. It engulfs most of your lower half with a slight pleasurable feeling around your waist and groin. Once it made it to your hips, you notice something.
1551321.title: Goodra

155322.content:
You've chosen Generation five. You appear in a room with buttons of all shapes and sizes, each of them, a pokemon icon on them.

The flashing light overhead says: TRANSFORMATION CENTER: PLEASE CHOOSE A POKEMON
155322.title: Generation 5

1553221.content: You touch the button with the cute Yamask on it. A loud voice booms overhead. "YAMASK: YES OR NO?"
1553221.title: Yamask

15532211.content:
The Yamask button flashes on and off. A light stikes you and you topple over against the wall. As you open your eyes again, you feel a strang sensation in your legs. You look down in awe. The two legs you were so used to were coming together! You shriek in pain as the bones of your legs crunch together and become one lone leg. The long, single leg starts to shrink, as bones are crushed together to become smaller. You squeal in pain as the leg fades darker and darker until it is a small, black tendril.

The tendril then lifts of the ground and you are suspended in midair. Although in the air, you are unable to move as you sob as the transformations continue. The changes makes its way to your waist as it crunches and thins to become part of your leg. You try to endure the pain as it makes makes its way to your arms.

Your arms are then spread from side to side, almost as if you are about to embrace someone. It doesn't hurt, just leaves you in a state of peace. The calm doesn't last for long as the pain wracks your arms and they are crushed beyong repair. Your thumbs slowly dwinlde and recede back into your hands and they are forced ito a balled-fist position. As you scream at the uncomfortable sight of your arms (or what was left of them) slowly turning black, you then notice there are only a few changes left to go.

The transformations make your way to your head, and you scream for help as your face seems to scrunch up into a permanent position, forcing your eyes closed and your frown to become permanently etched into your face. All at once, a sensation begins in your forehead as a strange, horn-like object juts its way out and starts to force your face to slowly peel off of your skull. As it hits the ground, the face hardens and turns gold, showing your faceless expression. Your eyes then swell larger and become red, your nose becomes larger and juts from your face. What is left of your face then becomes black like the rest of you, and the shrinking begins.

Your body seems to bee tented in your clothing, as your bones become smaller and smaller, as you can her the sickening snaps from within. As the crushing feeling seems to stop, you then realize you can move, or float. Your tendril feels around the floor and grab the gold face, tucking it under you. You floated back up to the computer.

TRANSFORMATION COMPLETE, HAVE A NICE DAY!
